thread.title_full: Bus Station: New Bus Station Inaugurated by Transport Minister in Kanpur | Kanpur News - Times of India

author: Times Of India
title: Bus Station: New Bus Station Inaugurated by Transport Minister in Kanpur | Kanpur News - Times of India
text: Kanpur: State transport minister Daya Shankar Singh launched bus service from Signature Greens city bus station on Thursday.Singh flagged off the buses for 11 routes including Lucknow, Ayodhya, Bidhuna, Etah, Delhi and Mainpuri. A total of 30 buses will be run in the first phase. The buses for Lucknow and Ayodhya will go via Ganga Barrage. While this will save time for people traveling through Jajmau, they will also not face traffic jams in Unnao. A senior UPSRTC official said, “The new bus depot will be equipped with a fleet of 40 buses. It will have a capacity to park 20 buses at the platform at one go. This will be the fourth bus station which will cater to the needs of lakhs of people, particularly city’s north area.”We recently18 killed, 19 injured as bus from Bihar to Delhi rams into milk tanker on Lucknow-Agra Expressway in UnnaoTragic accident on Lucknow-Agra expressway leaves 18 dead and 19 injured. Sleeper bus collides with milk tanker. Authorities providing support and victims taken to hospitals. Traffic affected for hours. Details on Unnao road accident.11162413318 dead as bus crashes into tanker on Agra-Lucknow expresswayTragedy on Agra-Lucknow Expressway as bus collision leaves 18 dead and 19 injured in UP's Unnao. Prompt response by authorities as injured are taken to CHC Bangarmau for treatment. UP CM Yogi Adityanath offers condolences and directs swift relief efforts.11162044218 killed as bus rams milk tanker on Lucknow-Agra ExpresswayTragic accident on Lucknow-Agra Expressway leaves 18 dead and 19 injured as bus collides with milk tanker. Eyewitnesses allege bus driver was drunk and speeding. The victims, except for the tanker driver, were from Bihar districts. Stay informed about the latest updates on this fatal crash.111643321
